comments.text:
well, it is still built with optimizations when optimizations are enabled. In bug 669953 we will switch all the bots build to use them, would that make this patch OK?

If not, two alternatives to avoid the "we set flags all over the place" problem are:

*) build all host tools with optimization by default.
*) add a flag like MOZ_FORCE_OPTIMIZED that when set causes optimizations to be used, but doesn't set which optimization flags are used.
